11.eng-name: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Abu Sa’id reported The Apostel of Allah (SWAS) as saying:A woman who believes in Allah and the Last Day must not make a journey of more than three days unless she is accompanied by her father or her brother, or her husband or her son or her relative who is within the prohibited degree

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَرْأَةِ تَحُجُّ بِغَيْرِ مَحْرَمٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Woman Who Performs Hajj Without A Mahram
